original_title: ఇండియన్ లవ్ స్టోరీ యొక్క స్క్రీన్ ప్లే
overview: An immensely successful film director is getting ready for his latest release when he gets the shock of his life - his wife wants a divorce. He places a condition before her, that the two of them should spend 24 hours in a far off place, with no other people and no outside communication, after which she can do as she pleases. She agrees and they drive to a farmhouse, but will 24 hours be enough for him to re-captivate his wife?
title: Screenplay of an Indian Love Story
